4302400.name: Cube Commando
4302400.description:
In a fractured, dystopian future, technology has outgrown humanity.

You play as a hardened commando navigating hostile facilities filled with armed enemies, automated turrets, crushing machines, spinning saws, and deadly traps. What begins as a dangerous mission quickly turns personal — the search for a missing person lost somewhere inside a collapsing world of cold steel and forgotten experiments.

Cube Commando blends fast-paced combat, tight platforming, and atmospheric sci-fi storytelling in a focused 2.5D side-scrolling experience.

Every area is designed to test your reflexes, awareness, and survival instincts. There are no safe paths — only calculated movement, precise shooting, and learning from failure.
4302400.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
